sentences.english: Zhao Zilong reported to you that Jingzhou is facing danger, you wanna go back, so you came up with this idea.
sentences.chinese: 方纔趙子龍報說荊州危急，你欲還鄉，故推此意。

sentences.english: In 1966 the situation reached crisis point and Utzon resigned from the project.
sentences.chinese: 1966年情況變得危急，伍松辭去了任務。

sentences.english: A crisis, down to the sea of maozedong holds double axes.
sentences.chinese: 危急關頭，雄闊海雙斧殺到。

sentences.english: Being David and Johnthan, they always help each other when in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 作爲生死之交，他們總是在危急時刻互相幫助。

sentences.english: She grabbed the rope at teh critical moment.
sentences.chinese: 在這危急時刻她抓住了繩子。

sentences.english: 'The situation has been very critical, ' said Mr. Li, 'especially in Henan province.
sentences.chinese: 李方平說，形勢非常危急，尤其是在河南省。

sentences.english: Chen Tianfang see the situation is critical, led by the Cang wolf commandos launched rescue operations.
sentences.chinese: 陳天放眼見形勢危急，率領蒼狼突擊隊展開營救行動。

sentences.english: Hermione, characteristically , prefers to remain serious and earnest in tense times.
sentences.chinese: 赫敏在情況危急時喜歡保持嚴肅認真。

sentences.english: There was no time to lose, and no time to discuss the matter with the family.
sentences.chinese: 情況緊急，危急萬分，沒有時間與家人商量了。

sentences.english: The question before the house is one of awful moment to this country.
sentences.chinese: 擺在全體代表面前的是關係我國危急存亡的重大問題。

sentences.english: She always stays cool, calm and collected in a crisis.
sentences.chinese: 她在危急關頭總是很冷靜鎮定，處之泰然。

sentences.english: She remains hospitalized in a critical condition.
sentences.chinese: 她仍在醫院接受治療，病況危急。

sentences.english: The doctors managed to resuscitate her, but she remained in a critical condition.
sentences.chinese: 醫生們設法讓她甦醒，但她始終處於危急狀況。

sentences.english: The 69-year-old male patient is reported to be in a critical condition.
sentences.chinese: 據報道，患者爲男性，69歲，目前情況危急。

sentences.english: He kept his countenance in such a dangerous situation.
sentences.chinese: 我們要在危急時刻保持鎮定自若的。

sentences.english: He said the situation was dire and that time was of the essence.
sentences.chinese: 他說，形勢危急，需要當機立斷。

definition: in imminent peril (idiom)/on the brink of crisis
vitally important/a matter of life and death
the critical moment/life and death crisis
urgent and important moment (idiom); critical juncture
to come to the aid of/to save/to rescue from danger/to relieve
a thousand pounds hangs by a thread (idiom)/imminent peril/a matter of life or death
precarious as pile of eggs (idiom); ready to fall and break at any moment/in a dangerous state
